author: Luc Olinga
title: Trump Media Has a Bold Plan to Regain Confidence
description: With its stock down almost 48% this year, the company behind Truth Social is authorizing a massive $400 million share repurchase.
content:
Trump Media and Technology Group, the company behind Truth Social, announced an ambitious new financial strategy on Monday: it’s going to spend up to $400 million to buy its own stock.
